name: HistoryOfGastrointestinalBleeds
title: History of Gastrointestinal Bleeds
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains Gastrointenstinal Bleeding conditions.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have had a history of Gastrointestinal Bleeding. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Condition category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes ICD9CM codes for Gastrointestinal Bleeding conditions.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
